value: Re-watchers, NO SPOILER, please. Thank you.

FYI, Mei Shinan is Su's father general's self styled name when he was travelling the country in his youth
The name of 'Lin Shu', Lin is the surname and means forest; Shu is the given name, which means special and unique. His another name is ' Mei
